title: Find Harmonized System (HS) Code: How to find a HS Code - Xtransfer
introduction: XTransfer is an all-in-one business account that covers 15+ currencies and 200+ countries/regions. It allows users to create and maintain their accounts, hold multiple currencies, add/receive money, and transfer funds securely and cost-effectively. The platform also provides information on Harmonized System (HS) Codes and their impact on international trade.
features: Ability to add money from bank accounts and receive global payments
Transfer funds securely to global suppliers
Support for local currencies from 17+ countries/regions
Professional service team available for assistance

faqs.question: What are Harmonized System (HS) Codes?
faqs.answer: HS codes are a standardized numerical method of classifying traded products used by customs authorities worldwide for assessing duties and taxes, as well as for gathering trade statistics.

faqs.question: How are HS Codes used in international trade?
faqs.answer: HS codes are used to classify goods for shipment, report shipments in the Automated Export System, complete shipping documentation, determine import tariff rates, conduct market research, and comply with relevant laws.

faqs.question: How do HS Codes affect tariffs and trade agreements?
faqs.answer: HS codes determine the tariff rates for goods and can affect whether a product qualifies for a preferential tariff under a free trade agreement. Originating status, indicated by a change in the commodity code, can grant access to preferential tariffs.
